mapper.update: update bamboo set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where seq=#{seq}
update bamboo set viewCount=viewCount+1 where seq=#{value}
mapper.select: select bamboo.*,(select count(*) from bambooComments where bamSeq=bamboo.seq) as commentCount from (select bamboo.*, row_number() over(order by seq desc) rown from bamboo) bamboo where rown between #{start} and #{end} order by seq desc

select count(seq) from bamboo
where (title like '%${search}%')
where (writer like '%${search}%')
where (title like '%${search}%')
